title: Ticket #6673: COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS causes all accounting ads to be rejected
description: When COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS is set, the collector rejects all accounting ad updates. This is due to CollectorEngine::ValidateClassAd() not expecting the UPDATE_ACCOUNTING_AD command integer.
remarks:
2018-May-10 10:14:47 by gthain:
CODE REVIEW While this fixes the immediate problem, should the collector reject unknown ad types? Isn't this a compatbility headache?
derived_tickets: #6682   COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS shouldn't reject unknown command types
check_ins:
2018-May-09 10:10   Check-in [54896]: Docs for rejected accounting ads with COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS bug fix. #6673 (By Jaime Frey )
2018-May-09 10:06   Check-in [54893]: Recognize accounting ads with COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS. #6673 (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
